thread.title: Oscars 2017 Red Carpet: Jessica Biel’s Hair and Makeup
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017 Red Carpet: Jessica Biel’s Hair and Makeup

title: Oscars 2017 Red Carpet: Jessica Biel’s Hair and Makeup

organizations.name: makeup jessica biel dominates the red carpet

text: Jessica Biel Dominates the Red Carpet with High Glamour Hair and a Statuette-Worthy Body February 27, 2017 1:21 AM by Calin Van Paris Photo: Getty Images Tonight, for the Oscars 2017 red carpet, Jessica Biel took the iconic nature of the Academy Awards to heart. The actress seemingly channeled the Academy’s signature gold statuette for a head-turning aesthetic that melded the actress’ Choctaw heritage with a heady dose of glamour. Loading View on Instagram Biel’s gilded column dress—designed by Kaufman Franco—struck a sculptural note, culminating in a metallic collar formed of strips of gold that fanned out like feathers. Above the neck, the actress’ brunette was separated sleekly at center and pulled back into a low, super-polished take on the chignon that veered slightly to the left, with not a single hair astray. Rather than finishing the look with a scene-stealing bold lip, Biel’s makeup palette skewed peach, with lips, cheekbones, and lids saturated in a warm, burnished glow. And the final touch? Dramatic flicks of black eyeliner, which coupled with the glossy updo, imbued Biel’s earthy glamour with a touch of Elizabeth Taylor-like vamp. Biel's takeaway from Oscars 2017? Be your own eye-catching prize. In This Story: Oscars , Jessica Biel Recommended For You
